page.title: 14Clubs around Langho
page.content: There are several organisations existing in the area all concerned with interests , hobbies or pursuits of an amateur or educational nature . For children of various ages up to school-age there is a play group . Older children are catered for by the Scout and Guide organisations . Troops of Cubs , Scouts , Brownies and Guides are sponsored by the Roman Catholic and Church of England groups . The Catholic , C of E and Methodist churches all have "Mothers' Union " and "Men's Clubs " . For ladies we have the Women's Institute . Men or boys in the village can be members of clubs or societies which cater for their own interests ; football , angling , gardening , golf or cricket .
